'''More-and-More''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for More-and-More is obtainable from [[Kiminami Anna]] at [[Kiminami Restaurant]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, More-and-More increases all party members' {{Color|Physical DMG}} by '''20'''/'''30'''/'''40'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
